apps.chess

Class PlayersCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • apps.chess.PlayersCollection

  • public class PlayersCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    Object representing a collection of chess players with games played in a certainGamesMetaDataCollection

      A synonim for size();
      int[] getTotalBlackGames()
      A method to get an total black repertoire from the collection Black and white repertoire can be different, since the collection need not be a total collection of all hte players who played the games in the game collection - rather a filtered subset

        public boolean isEmpty()
        checks if there are players in the collection
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        dc - GamesMetaDataCollection that is to be set as the ones from which the game indexes in player repertoirs are drawn from

        Returns:

      • getNumberOfPlayers

        public int getNumberOfPlayers()
        A synonim for size();
        Returns:

      • getTotalWhiteGames

        public int[] getTotalWhiteGames()
        A method to get an total white repertoire from the collection Black and white repertoire can be different, since the collection need not be a total collection of all hte players who played the games in the game collection - rather a filtered subset
        Returns:
        total number of games played in each of the ECO variations by these players as white

      • getTotalBlackGames

        public int[] getTotalBlackGames()
        A method to get an total black repertoire from the collection Black and white repertoire can be different, since the collection need not be a total collection of all hte players who played the games in the game collection - rather a filtered subset
        Returns:
        total number of games played in each of the ECO variations by these players as black

      • populateFromGamesMetaDataCollection

                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a players Collection corresponding to the games meta data collection
        Parameters:
        dc - GamesMetaDataCollection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
